title: Apple releases macOS 12.4 beta 2 for developers
content:
Following up on launching the first macOS 12.4 beta for developers and public testers two weeks ago, Apple has seeded the second macOS 12.4 beta today to developers.

more…

The post Apple releases macOS 12.4 beta 2 for developers appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Following up on launching the first macOS 12.4 beta for developers and public testers two weeks ago, Apple has seeded the second macOS 12.4 beta today to developers. macOS 12.4 beta 2 is now available via OTA for developers already enrolled in the beta as well as being available soon from Apple’s Developer website.
